it works 100% its to bad he didnt put instructions for all you idiots who download cracks and dont know  how to put it in. heres the instructions=D

1. download it 
2. extract it to your desktop or to a folder using your winrar/or extractor device.
3. install it. 
4. open the crack folder and put the files from the crack folder in to 2kgames\borderlands\bineries and replace the old one. then if you try luanching it should load. if you get an error when it is loading, then try rebooting your computer. i spent hours trying to fix it and all i had to do was reboot.

ok this is how you find
2kgames\borderlands\bineries 
go to start and in Search type C:/ then  click on 1 search result
go to program files
2k games
Gearbox sofware
BorderLands
and finally Binariers
hope that helps

Ok I have no idea where the crack files are located. Is it located in the ISO itself? If not, where is it located??

The Crack is in the ISO. 

Go to My Computer and explore your virtual drive that you have the ISO mounted on. The crack will be there.

Copy the crack to the Binaries folder of your Borderlands install and you should be good to go.
